title: Aromar 60ml Fragrance Oil Premium Quality SPA Collection Baby Powder+Channel#5+Honey Rose+ Sandalwood Forest (Pack of 4)
features: REJUVENATING AROMATIC OILS – Crafted with premium synthetic aroma compounds and diluted essential oils these fragrance oils fill your room or space with soothing aromatherapy that’s perfect for enhancing the atmosphere.

UNIVERSAL DIFFUSER COMPATIBILITY – Our home fragrance oil can be used with common electric aroma and oil diffusers, mechanical diffusers, sprayers, and other aromatic diffusion devices to better support your personal and professional fragrance needs.
LIGHT, FRESH, ROOM-FILLING SCENTS – AROMAR designer fragrance oils come in a wide range of exciting, relaxing, and revitalizing scents

USER FRIENDLY BOTTLE SIZE – We want to make it easier for you to employ our luxury fragrance oils which is why we offer it in convenient 2oz. bottles size for easier application Ideal for daily home use or even when traveling.

CRAFTED AND TESTED IN-HOUSE – Here at AROMAR we’re focused on bringing you the highest-quality fragrance oils possible which is why every scent is carefully crafted by our experienced team to ensure you’re getting the best support possible.
description: Experience the Light, Revitalizing Scent of AROMAR Fragrance Oils Creating a truly relaxing or welcoming home environment often starts with the way a room smells, especially when it comes to entertaining friends and guests. And whether you're looking to relax alone in the bedroom, make sure the whole scent of your home feels as pleasant as the holidays. In any case, nothing provides the kind of light, fresh scent that you will find in AROMAR scent oils. Formulated with the highest quality ingredients and conceived under strict selection criteria, they are carefully balanced to provide a relaxing aromatherapy that does not overpower your senses, therefore AROMAR aromatic oils are the perfect fragrant choice for personal and professional use.
